explains: n. 后见之明；枪的照门

sentences.en: With hindsight, we'd all do things differently.
sentences.cn: 事后想来，我们可能都会以不同的方式做事。

sentences.en: What looks obvious in hindsight was not at all obvious at the time.
sentences.cn: 事后一目了然的在当时根本看不清。

sentences.en: With hindsight, it was significant that the boat was found and studied by mainstream archaeologists who naturally focused on its cultural context.
sentences.cn: 事后看来，主流考古学家发现和研究这艘船是很有意义的，他们自然会关注它的文化背景。
